description: Deletes a node that your Amazon Web Services account owns. All data on the node is lost and cannot be recovered. Applies to Hyperledger Fabric and Ethereum.

parameters.name: NetworkId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the network that the node is on. Ethereum public networks have the following ``NetworkId``s: n-ethereum-mainnet.

parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the member that owns this node. Applies only to Hyperledger Fabric and is required for Hyperledger Fabric.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the node.
